author: pietverwilligen
body:
This pull request contains the first implementation of the GEMSegment.
Along with purely GEMSegment code, it contains also:
- adding debug info in GEM Digitizer
- extension of the GEM Geometry: implementation of GEM Chamber and GEM SuperChamber
- extension of the ME0 Geometry: implementation of ME0 Chamber that contains 6 ME0Layers
- changes in GEMDetId and ME0DetId to give structures above a consistent detId
- Fireworks code to visualize ME0Segment and GEMSegments
title: GEM Segment
